entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 2.3°C

Humidity: 71 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 70 early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
